sourceMeaningMnemonic: Give <radical>alcohol</radical> to a <radical>demon</radical> and you'll see how <kanji>ugly</kanji> it really is. Demons need to concentrate to keep their disguises going. Even if it looked pretty when you met it, like super handsome, give it a few drinks and its facade will slide off and reveal its super gross demon face.
meaningInfo: Picture the drunk demon as its pretty face drips off revealing the ugly crap piled underneath.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>ugly</kanji> demon is drunk and taking off his <reading>shoe</reading>s (<ja>しゅう</ja>) and swinging them around his head. And, oh no, he's drinking more alcohol out of the shoes.
readingInfo: The demon drinking alcohol out of its nasty shoes is the ugliest scene you've ever seen.
